item.description:
For the first time ever, Ultra Light Startups will be simulcasting an event from New York to a live, in-person audience gathered at WorkBar Boston. Boston attendees will participate in the startup pitches, networking, and panel discussion (see details below) taking place in New York. We will watch a live video stream, ask the speakers questions, and see the responses live, as if we were there in person. It is a great opportunity to hear a fantastic panel, make new business connections with startups in New York, and network with fellow Ultra Light Startups Boston members.

Bootstrapped to Millions in Profit
This panel features the candid, real-life stories of four successful, bootstrapped technology entrepreneurs. Each entrepreneur founded his company with zero external capital and now has over $1 million in revenues. The panel is inspired by a submission to South By Southwest 2011 with the same name and speakers.


    Topics include:
  • Idea Generating
  • Team Building
  • Off Hours
  • Consulting on the Side
  • Thereâ€™s No Need to Rush
  • Building Organically
  • Making That First Dollar
  • When Investors Come Calling



    Moderator:
  • Graham Lawlor, Founder of Ultra Light Startups



    Panelists (alphabetic order):
  • Anthony Casalena, Founder of Squarespace
  • Spencer Fry, Co-founder and CEO of Carbonmade
  • Danny Wen, Co-founder of Harvest
  • Anthony Volodkin, Founder of The Hype Machine
item.name: Bootstrapped to Millions in Profit
